name: RandomPoem
0:
”Echo launch random poem”
”Echo ask random poem for a poem”
”Echo ask random poem to read me something”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random poem
des:
This Alexa skill will read you a poem on command. From poets like William Blake to Rudyard Kipling, this is something to brighten and inspire you any time any day.

Icon made by Pixel Perfect at Flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
